trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Waukegan
There were no other sightings in Waukegan on or around November 30th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked out into my moms back yard late at night and looked up in the sky and saw a huge round ship above my moms back yard. At least it looked like it was above her yard to me. It was silent and had many lights coming out of the bottom that were moving around. It was beautiful, I was amazed and just stared at it thinking that it was going to go away at any moment. I thought the object was a UFO. I told my mom the next day and she did not beleive me, she said to wake her up next time I see a UFO in her back yard, jokingly.The UFO made me fell kind of hypnotized I dont know if it was all the colors or the fact that it was a UFO. It was 10 years ago and this part is a little fogy but I think it kind of just vanished,no sound or lights just gone.
Summary: Huge colorful disk or circle shape with a lot of colors coming our the bottom
